htmlContent:
Until end of turn, when USA launches a coup in a battleground, do not decrement DEFCON.

(This does not prevent USA from losing the game to 040-M Cuban Missile Crisis.)
name: Nuclear Subs*
plainContent:
Until end of turn, when USA launches a coup in a battleground, do not decrement DEFCON.
(This does not prevent USA from losing the game to 040-M Cuban Missile Crisis.)
